title: Maximum discipline for selected player offenses in the NFL 2011/2012
summary: This is a bar chart representing Fine Types in the x axis and Maximum fine (in U.S. dollars) in the y axis.
The Maximum fine (in U.S. dollars) is appeared to be the highest at Fine Types Unexcused late reporting foror absence from preseason training and lowest at Fine Types Being overweight (per lb.).
There is a difference of 29530.0 between the maximum Fine Types Unexcused late reporting foror absence from preseason training and minimum Fine Types Being overweight (per lb.).
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Fine Types in the x axis and Maximum fine (in U.S. dollars) in the y axis.

The maximum Maximum fine (in U.S. dollars) 30000.0 is found at Fine Types Unexcused late reporting foror absence from preseason training and the minimum is found at Being overweight (per lb.) where Maximum fine (in U.S. dollars) is 470.0.

Maximum fine (in U.S. dollars) at Fine Types Unexcused late reporting foror absence from preseason training is 30000.0 , second place is  at 30000.0, and thirdly is Loss of playbook scouting reportor game plan at 9440.0.

Fine Types Throwing football into stands, Losing damaging or alteringClub-provided equipment, Failure to promptly report injury, and Unexcused late reportingfor team activity have the same Maximum fine (in U.S. dollars).
The average Maximum fine (in U.S. dollars) in all 9 Fine Typess is 9047.78.
